ygData.subject: Re: /tell sylly guess what else they changed?
ygData.msgSnippet: DW Gob pets will run to certain places in Lake Rathe and Oasis (I can hear the dw gob rangers cursing at the dw gob shaman damnit, if you cant control your
ygData.messageBody:
DW Gob pets will run to certain places in Lake Rathe and Oasis (I can hear
the dw gob rangers cursing at the dw gob shaman "damnit, if you cant control
your pet, dont summon him in the first place!") and mid 20's and up would
feast on them for xp. Now, I guess they show up expecting to kill pets and
....

surprize, surprize, you get the pet's master and all his buddies too!

My point was - look out if your group is used to pulling dw pets!~

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: Perhaps a Princess... <sarah@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 11:57 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] /tell sylly guess what else they changed?


> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> >Tyshark tells you, did you hear what they did to deep water goblin pets?
> >
> >r no what?
> >
> >Tyshark tells you, well, if you attack a a dw gob pet, you pull the dw
gob
> >too! =(
> >
> >r hehe, really?
> >
> >Tyshark tells you, a whole bunch of dw gobs actually!! =( !!!
> >
> >Sylly
>
> That makes sense.
>
> Usually when you attack a pet, you should aggro the pet's owner. And
> if you pull the owner, you're going to pull all the DW goblins in
> aggro range of the one you aggro'd.
>
> I've always thought it strange you -didn't-
>
> Sarah Heacock sarah@...
> Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
> Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
> Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
> Faesong, level 7 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Solusek Ro (Qeynos Hills)
>
